pageProduct.name: White Glo Fresh Breath Mouth Spray Peppermint 20ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Kills the bacteria that causes bad breath

Warnings

In case of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor. Children under the age of 6 may use under the instruction of a dentist only if deemed necessary and safe.

Common Uses

Instant fresh breath

Ingredients

AQUA ALCOHOL SORBITOL PEG-40 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL XYLITOL PARFUM SODIUM BENZOATE MENTHOL SODIUM SACCHARIN CITRIC ACID CETYLPYRIDINIUM CHLORIDE CITRONELLOL GERANIOL LILIAL

Directions

Antibacterial mouth spray for on the go
